pr_title: fix execute flush command while inserting bug

timeline.bodyText: Don't we have to close the file resources? Should we move it to syncCloseAllTsFileProcessors() instead of directly deleting it?
timeline.author: JackieTien97

replies.bodyText: It's already be closed in closeUnsealedTsFileProcessor() when the close call back
replies.author: qiaojialin

timeline.message: enable write when executing flush command
